content: I think I'll look into Allegretto Vineyard Resort and Hotel Cheval. They both sound like great options with a wine country feel. Since I've already spent two nights in Santa Barbara and went wine tasting in the nearby Santa Ynez Valley with my friends, I'm excited to experience a new wine region. Do you have any recommendations for restaurants in Paso Robles? I'd love to try some of the local cuisine and wine pairings.
